item.description:
Hi everyone!

Let's meet up at the Sharon Dog Park, Saturday, September 19th at 11:00a! This is a beautiful dog park that allows bullies! Responsible owners, bring your sweet-natured dogs to meet 'n greet 'n play! Directions can be found on the Sharon Dog Park website at www.sharondogpark.org.

Also, the NEBBC will be participating in Gloucester's Dog Day on Sunday, September 13th, and Pet Rock Fest in Worcester, also on the 13th. We will also be at Sturbridge's Walk 'n Wag (through Second Chance rescue) on Sunday September 20th. We need volunteers, especially for Gloucester and Sturbridge! We need people to help man our booths, hand out info, and reel people in! Also, we are taking donations of dog treats, goods, homemade biscuits, doggie bandanas, or any other creative ideas or items that will help promote us and raise awareness! If you can help, email Cassie at JustCassie101@comcast.net.

Also, if you haven't filled out your official member application on www.newenglandbullybreedclub.com, please do so right away so I can put your on our mailing list and you don't miss anything!

Great opportunities to raise awareness and have some fun! Hope to hear from you soon!

Cassie-Leigh Stock
President
New England Bully Breed Club
www.newenglandbullybreedclub.com
item.name: Meet-up at the Sharon Dog Park!
